title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 1.2 - Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 1.2 - Requirements

State Regulations

To enhance the likelihood of success of a proposed new bank
or trust company, the Banking Board requires: (a) the employment of top management
personnel having substantial and satisfactory experience in general commercial
bank operations, if the proposed institution will offer significant banking
services; (b) if a trust company is
to be chartered, the employment of top management personnel having substantial
and satisfactory experience in fiduciary operations; (c) insurance of deposits by the Federal

Deposit Insurance Corporation; and
(d) capital funds of not less than $1.2
million. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
